references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a highly capable language model used in the visual retriever, making it a crucial foundation for the study's results.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces Qwen-VL, a versatile vision-language model, which is one of the models used in evaluating the effectiveness of the proposed MMDocIR benchmark.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper introduces PaliGemma, another vision-language model used in the evaluation section of the paper, hence important to the results.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces DPR, a highly influential dense passage retrieval technique that is compared against in the experimental evaluation.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: This paper introduces ColBERT, an efficient and effective passage search method that is used as a baseline and compared to the proposed method in the paper.
